title: The Role of Community Hospitals in Fighting COVID-19
itunes:title: The Role of Community Hospitals in Fighting COVID-19
description:
Dr. Harold Paz, CEO of Wexner Medical Center at Ohio State University, discusses collaborating with community hospitals to fight COVID-19. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Health Care Reporter Robert Langreth share their insight on Gilead’s Remdesivir. We get Businessweek Economics with Dr. Ellen Hughes-Cromwick, Senior Resident Fellow at Third Way. She talks about the need for increased fiscal support from the U.S. government. And we Drive to the Close with Brad McMillan, CIO at Commonwealth Financial Network.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
